body.p:
Rooms of General Court-Martial and Military Commission,
CHANCERY COURT ROOM, COURT-HOUSE,
Louisville, Kentucky, Sept 15th 1865.
James R. Page Esqr
Asst Sec State
The undersigned Edwin Thomson, a citisen of Louisville Jefferson County, Kentucky, hereby makes application for the appointment to the office of Notary Public in and for the county of Jefferson Ky.

Please see enclosed papers &c
Respectfully
Yours &c
Edwin Thomson

P. O. address "Box 197" Louisville
Louisville Ky.
Sept. 16th 1865.

The within application of Edwin Thomson is respectfully recommended to favorable consideration. Mr Thomson is Chief Clerk of the Court Martial and military Commission of which I am Judge Advocate, and his appointment as Notary will greatly facilitate citisen witnesses in securing their pay for transportation to and from, and attendance on the court.

C. Thomson
Major 5th U. S. C. C.
Judge Advocate
